main event: Multiple observations of a satellite, identified as Satellite ECHO I, during various dates in June 1963.
interesting points: There were seven observations of the satellite assumed to be the same object,The object had a magnitude of 3 to 4 and was circular in shape,The satellite moved similarly to the vessel M3 Ascanius,The sighting was reported at various times, no photographs were included in the report,The observations took place during a passage from Shimya to San Pedro.
witness description: Many witnesses on board the MS Ascanius.
